Entries.Introduction: Oh, hey. So you're the new guy, huh? Cool.^Hey, you're the new girl, huh? I think we're going to get along great. I'm Alexa.#$e#I'll see you around.
Entries.Resort_Chair: Aren't you hot in that outfit? You gotta get some ocean breeze goin'!^Aren't you hot in that outfit? C'mon, girl... It's the beach!
Entries.Resort_Towel_2: Phew, it feels good to finally get these curves a little sunlight.#$e#Kind of a shame to have them hidden away all the time back home.
Entries.Tue: The beach is a cool place to hang out and soak up some rays.#e#You gotta spend some time in the sun or else you'll get all pale.#$e#Hey, do you wanna hang out with me at the beach some time? Do you wear trunks or briefs?$s^*sigh*... I wish there were more guys in this town, know what I mean?
Entries.Fri: Hey, what's up farmer guy? Did you get new pants? You're doing something right.^Hey, it's farm girl.#e#Oh, I almost forgot! It's my day for doing push-ups!#e#Every time I do push-ups I try to do one more than last time. Pretty cool strategy, huh?
Entries.Sat: My arms are really sore, but that's the sign of progress for a girl like me.#e#I must've done a thousand push-ups yesterday.
Entries.summer_Mon: Hey, farmer guy. You've got a nice tan going.^Hey Farmer girl. You look a little burnt.$h#$e#The more I practice this summer, the easier it'll be for me to go pro.#$e#Then you'd be able to say you knew me once. Cool, huh?
Entries.summer_Tue: If my hair wasn't so popular with the guys, I swear I'd shave it all off in a second.#$e#*sigh*... Life can be tough.
Entries.summer_Wed: Hey farm guy, I've got a question for you.^Hey Farm girl, I've got a question for you.#$b#$q 52/53 summer_Wed_01_old#Do you think I'll ever turn pro?#$r 52 30 summer_Wed_01_01#You're destined to be a sports legend#$r 52 0 summer_Wed_01_02#Maybe, if you practice a lot#$r 53 -50 summer_Wed_01_03#No, you'll most likely fail and become a waitress
Entries.fall_Wed: Hey, I want to ask you something.^Hey, can I ask you something?#$e#$q 54/55 fall_Wed_01_old#What do you think about my haircut?^Do you think the guys like my haircut?#$r 54 30 fall_Wed_01_01#It looks very fashionable.#$r 55 -30 fall_Wed_01_02#It looks like some kind of fungal growth.

Entries.summer_Mon_inlaw_Alex: How's my granddaughter doing? I imagine she's quite happy living on the farm.#$e#She deserves to be happy... she's a good girl.
Entries.fall_Sat: Are you friends with Alexa?#$e#Sometimes she worries me sick.

Entries.Wed: Alexa is my granddaughter. Have I told you that already?#$e#Huh? Speak up.
Entries.Wed_inlaw_Alex: You're part of the family, now. I'm glad that my granddaughter found such a nice husband.^How can two women get married? It's unnatural... Hmmph. I guess I'm just "old fashioned"...
Entries.Wed10_inlaw_Alex: You're part of the family, now... and I couldn't be more proud.^I'll admit, I thought it was... strange... for two women to be together. But you're such a nice young woman, and I know you two are in love... I've changed my mind.
Entries.Wed8: I wish my legs worked so I could play catch with Alexa.$s#$e#That'll never happen.$s

Entries.Event_room1: Her? No!#$b#...Well, I guess I used to like Alexa. But not anymore! She's immature.
Entries.summer_Fri: I wonder what Alexa is doing today...#$e#Huh? I didn't notice you standing there.
Entries.winter_Sun: Will you say hi to Alexa for me?#$e#Thanks.
Entries.winter_Sun6: Um, if you see Alexa could you tell her I'm busy today?#$e#Thanks.

Entries.Rainy_Day_3: *giggle*... I just woke up and I'm hungry for some protein.$9
Entries.Rainy_Day_4: I think I might start reading books. I don't want to become stagnant now that I'm a married girl!
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: How's it going? I've been carrying the old gridball around with me all day. A girl can pretend...$u
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: Oh... the smell? I've been eating garlic all day. I'm trying to stay healthy... Sorry.$l
Entries.OneKid_0: I'm still getting used to my new life as a stay-at-home mom.$h
Entries.OneKid_1: Little %kid1 is going to grow up strong, just like me.
Entries.OneKid_3: I wonder what it's like for other women to be pregnant...?$h
Entries.TwoKids_2: Maybe %kid2 will be the first professional gridball player from Pelican Town?$h
Entries.spring_23: Oh... tomorrow's the flower dance, isn't it? I better do some extra crunches tonight.$9#$e#Those dresses are pretty tight... and everyone's going to be watching closely.
Entries.summer_1: Summer's a very energetic time of year, and my body feels it too! I feel solid.

Entries.joshMessage: @,^meet me at the saloon tonight after dark. ^   -Alexa

Entries.9: Alexa's Strength Training Diet:^^*Complete Breakfast^*Salmon Dinner^^(I've learned to love this food... I can feel the protein!!)%revealtasteAlex201%revealtasteAlex212

Entries.25: Alexa's Bat/The sweet spot is dented from Alexa's famous Grand Slam./1/3/1/-8/0/0/2/-1/-1/0/.02/3

It was confusing... I'd never felt that way about anyone.$l#$b#Normally, when I have a crush on someone, the feeling goes away pretty quick...$l^I kept telling myself 'You can't have these kinds of feelings for another girl'.$l"/pause 800/speak Alex "...But with you, it kept growing.$l^...But my heart was telling me something else."/pause 400/emote Alex 40/pause 600/question fork1 "#I feel the same way.#I'm sorry... I don't feel that way about you."/pause 400/fork rejectJosh/speak Alex "...$l#$b#I can't believe it took this long to say that to each other.$l"/emote Alex 32/pause 800/animate Alex false false 400 40 41 41 40 41 41 40 41 41 40 41 41 40/pause 800/playSound eat/pause 800/playSound eat/pause 800/playSound eat/pause 800/playSound gulp/pause 400/speak Alex "Mmm... this steak is outsanding. Entries.3917590/n saloonSportsRoom/O Alex: distantBanjo/-100 -100/farmer 31 20 0 Alex 32 7 0 Shane 33 8 0 Gus 34 8 0 Kent 35 8 0 George 36 7 0/skippable/specificTemporarySprite gridballGameTV/viewport 34 7 true/move farmer 0 -13 1 true/pause 1000/textAboveHead Alex "Big play!"/pause 600/jump Gus/pause 2000/textAboveHead George "Score!"/pause 400/textAboveHead Alex "There we go!"/faceDirection Kent 3 true/faceDirection Gus 1 true/animate Gus false true 100 22/animate Kent false true 100 17/shake Gus 500/shake Kent 500/pause 500/textAboveHead George "Atta boy!"/pause 1000/stopAnimation Gus/stopAnimation Kent/faceDirection Kent 0 true/faceDirection Gus 0/pause 1000/faceDirection Alex 3/pause 400/speak Alex "Hey, @! You made it!$h"/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Alex "So... what do you think?"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/faceDirection Alex 3/speak Alex "I've been thinking... You know how I used to dream of being an athlete someday?#$b#Well, my life ended up turning out a bit different... $9#$b#I'm happy, though, don't get me wrong!$h#$b#...But I thought it would be cool to have a place where we all could hang out and watch the Sunday game. Gus liked the idea so much he offered me part of his back room!#$b#This way, I get to keep part of 'the dream' alive, in a small way."/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 600/faceDirection George 3/speak George "You did good, son. I could watch this at home, but coming here makes me feel young again!$h"/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Alex "Thanks, Grandpa."/pause 500/speak Kent "I'm happy for an excuse to get out of the house, and take my mind off things."/faceDirection Alex 2/pause 100/textAboveHead Shane "Same"/pause 1200/speak Gus "I'm having a lot of fun. And it's good for business!$h#$b#Though maybe not so good for Shane's liver...$s"/pause 100/faceDirection Shane 2 true/animate Shane false true 100 18/jump Shane/pause 500/textAboveHead Shane "Hey!"/pause 500/emote Alex 32/pause 2000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 400/message "It seems we have a new Sunday tradition."/pause 1000/message "5,000g well spent!"/pause 1000/end dialogue Alex "Thanks again for the money, @. It was a fun project for me, and everyone seems happy with it!"

Entries.3917589/n gaveAlexMoney/O Alex/d Mon/d T: continue/-1000 -1000/farmer 100 100 2/addWorldState saloonSportsRoom/addMailReceived saloonSportsRoom/message "It's Sunday... I should swing by the saloon later and see what Alexa has been up to!"/end

Entries.BathHouse_MensLocker.4: There's a bunch of pictures of bodybuilders taped inside the door.
Entries.JoshHouse.1: Momma-^If you're reading this, it means I've passed on. I'm so sorry you had to go through this. Know that I love you both.^Don't be too upset, I'm with Yoba now. ^My final request: take care of Alexa. She needs a family, something stable. She's a good girl.^ Love, ^Clara
Entries.JoshHouse.7: You peek into Alexa's drawer. There's clothes, hair gel, and a box of gridball trading cards.
Entries.JoshHouse.8: You peek into Alexa's drawer. There's clothes, hair gel, and a box of gridball trading cards.
Entries.JoshHouse.9: It's Alexa's gridball helmet. Looks like she keeps it polished.

Entries.Sun.000: %Alexa is completely engrossed in the game. She doesn't notice your presence.
